archiefmat.scope: The inventory numbers 14394 and 14395 contain only a small number of documents dating from before 1845; these were originally part of the archives of the governor (until 1828) en governor-general (1828-1845) respectively. The rest of the series contains letters and papers from both authorities and private persons in Suriname and from the Ministry of Colonies. These documents for some reason have been kept separate from the protocols; these include petitions that could not be taken into consideration because these were not drawn up according to the formal standards, but also letters regarding subjects that did not require a resolution by the governor. After 1854 the series almost exclusively consists of dispatches from the Ministry of Colonies.
archiefmat.notes:
Years: 1825; May-June 1842; 1845-1847; 1848; 1849-1853; January-March, May-October, December 1854; 1855; 1857-1858; 1860; 1865; 1870; 1872.

The complete series up to 1945 consists of 16 packs; 14 folders; 2 documents.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
